FuncDef: This command defines a Shared Risk Link Group (SRLG) which can be associated with an IP or MPLS interface.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the group, up to 32 characters. The association of group name and value should be unique within an IP/MPLS domain.
Specifies the integer value associated with the group. The association of group name and value should be unique within an IP/MPLS domain. Values-0 to 4294967295.
Specifies the integer value of the penalty weight that is assigned to the SRLG group. Values-0 to 65535. ParamDefault: Default- 0
